 */import{SET_IDENTITY}from'../../../constants/action-types';var initialState=null;export default(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_IDENTITY:return action.email||initialState;default:return state;}});
